allow: Bash(.specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh --json "[Fix the login/signup UI so it is embedded directly in the top-right corner of the Docusaurus navbar, aligned with the GitHub and theme toggle icons, not floating as a separate modal. The current popup appears awkwardly positioned and styled incorrectly. Rebuild it using Better Auth (https://www.better-auth.com/) but ensure its design matches the exact styling, colors, fonts, spacing, and responsiveness of the main website''s navbar in both light and dark mode. The ""Login"" button should be a small, clean text link or icon in the navbar, and clicking it should reveal a dropdown panel (not a full-screen modal) containing the login form, signup tab, email/password fields, ""Sign In"" button, and ""Or continue with GitHub/Google"" optionsâ€”all styled consistently with the site''s design system. Ensure smooth animations, proper z-index layering, and mobile responsiveness.]" --number 1 --short-name "navbar-auth-dropdown")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix: Update Node.js version to 24.x for Vercel deployment

- Added engines configuration to package.json to specify Node.js 24.x
- This resolves the Vercel build error about discontinued Node.js 18.x")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix: Update Node.js version to 24.x for Vercel deployment

- Updated package.json to specify Node.js 24.x in engines
- Updated .nvmrc to use Node.js 24
- Added Node.js 24.x engine specification to vercel.json
- This resolves the Vercel build error about discontinued Node.js 18.x")
